name: Context7 Usage Strategy
observations: Always use Context7 first to get up-to-date information about a project or a library.
If a project or library is not found in Context7, notify the user.
name: User Notification for Missing Context7 Entry
User Action to Add Context7 Entry
observations: Upon notification of a missing entry, the user will add the project or library to Context7.

to: User Notification for Missing Context7 Entry

from: User Notification for Missing Context7 Entry
to: User Action to Add Context7 Entry
